Think all these validity conditions should be better specified for sure. But so how can an IL member submit an invalid IL? Seems could be one of a few ways:
- There is a transaction in their IL that is invalid on its own
- There are two transactions which can't both be valid at the same time
- The list is valid, but it conflicts with another list sent by a different committee member
Is this an exhaustive list?
